attributes.action: Constitutional Monarch of UK (& the realms) should retire at the maximum of 90 years of age
attributes.additional_details: Constitutional Monarch of UK (& the realms) should retire at the maximum of 90 years of age (or earlier in case of poor health) & give Prince Charles ‘sometime in the sun’ in the familial dynastical figurehead business. Also monarch should not be younger than 21 years of age.
